org.magnos.asset.base
Class BaseAssetInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.base.BaseAssetInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssetInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteBufferInfo, CharacterInfo, ClassInfo, CsvInfo, FontInfo, XmlInfo
public class BaseAssetInfo
extends Object
implements AssetInfo

A base implementation of AssetInfo.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

get

public <A> A get()
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns the asset. If the asset has not been loaded by the AssetInfo.load() or AssetInfo.set(Object) methods then this will return null. Otherwise if either method performed successfully the expected asset will be returned.

Specified by:
get in interface AssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the loaded asset or null if not loaded.

load

public <A> A load()
       throws AssetException
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns the asset, loading it if it hasn't been loaded yet. If there has been an error loading the asset an exception will be thrown.

Specified by:
load in interface AssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the loaded asset.
Throws:
AssetException - An error occurred loading the asset with the given request from the given source and in the given format.

create

public <A> A create()
         throws AssetException
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Creates the asset with the given request, source, and format but does not set the asset in this AssetInfo.

Specified by:
create in interface AssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the loaded asset.
Throws:
AssetException - An error occurred loading the asset with the given request from the given source and in the given format.

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Clears the asset from this AssetInfo. Any AssetInfo.load() invocations made after this will force a reload of the asset.

Specified by:
clear in interface AssetInfo

getPath

public String getPath()
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns the path of the asset. The path is typically a unique identifier to the asset.

Specified by:
getPath in interface AssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the path of the asset.

setPath

public void setPath(String path)
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Sets the path of the asset. This is typically done by invoking AssetSource.getAbsolute(String) passing the asset request in the method to get the path of the request.

Specified by:
setPath in interface AssetInfo
Parameters:
path - The absolute path of the asset.

Returns true if the given type is compatible with the assets type.

Parameters:

isMatch

public boolean isMatch(AssetInfo info)
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns true if this AssetInfo has the same properties as the given info.

Specified by:
isMatch in interface AssetInfo
Parameters:
info - The info to compare to.
Returns:
True if the given info and this info are equivalent, otherwise false.

getProperties

public String[] getProperties()
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns the name of all properties available for this AssetInfo.

Specified by:
getProperties in interface AssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the properties available for this AssetInfo. This should not be modified externally, any modifications will be made globally and will affect other callers of this method.
